title: Photo ID
description: Verifiable Credential for a Photo ID.

family_name_unicode.title: Family Name
family_name_unicode.description: Unicode-encoded family name of the document holder.

given_name_unicode.title: Given Name
given_name_unicode.description: Unicode-encoded first name of the document holder.

birth_date.title: Birth Date
birth_date.description: Date of birth in ISO 8601 format.

portrait.title: Portrait
portrait.description: A reproduction of the document holderâ€™s portrait.

issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: Date when the document was issued.

expiry_date.title: Expiry Date
expiry_date.description: The date when the document expires.

issuing_authority_unicode.title: Issuing Authority
issuing_authority_unicode.description: The authority responsible for issuing the document.

sex.title: Sex
sex.description: Holder's sex using values as defined in ISO/IEC 5218. 0= Not known, 1 = Male, 2 = Female, 9 = non-applicable

nationality.title: Nationality
nationality.description: Nationality of the holder as two letter country code (alpha-2 code) or three letter code alpha-3 code) defined in ISO 3166-1.

name_at_birth.title: Name at Birth
name_at_birth.description: The name of the individual at birth.

birthplace.title: Birthplace
birthplace.description: Place of birth (country and municipality or state/province).

portrait_capture_date.title: Portrait Capture Date
portrait_capture_date.description: Date when the portrait was taken.

resident_address_unicode.title: Resident Address
resident_address_unicode.description: Unicode-encoded resident address of the individual.

age_over_18.title: Age Over 18
age_over_18.description: Indicates if the individual is over 18.

age_in_years.title: Age in Years
age_in_years.description: The age of the individual in years.

age_birth_year.title: Birth Year
age_birth_year.description: The birth year of the individual.

family_name_latin1.title: Family Name
family_name_latin1.description: latin1-encoded family name of the document holder.

given_name_latin1.title: Given Name
given_name_latin1.description: latin1-encoded first name of the document holder.

birth_country.title: Birth Country
birth_country.description: Country where the individual was born.

birth_state.title: Birth State
birth_state.description: State or province where the individual was born.

birth_city.title: Birth City
birth_city.description: City where the individual was born.

administrative_number.title: Administrative Number
administrative_number.description: Administrative number associated with the person.

resident_street.title: Street
resident_street.description: Street address of the individual's residence.

resident_house_number.title: House Number
resident_house_number.description: House number of the individual's residence.

travel_document_number.title: Travel Document Number
travel_document_number.description: Number of the travel document (e.g., passport number).

resident_state.title: Resident State
resident_state.description: The state/province/district where the Photo ID holder lives.

dtc_dg1.title: Data Group 1
dtc_dg1.description: The full MRZ data for DTC Data Group 1, encoded as a string.

dtc_dg2.title: Data Group 2
dtc_dg2.description: The biometric data for DTC Data Group 2 (e.g., facial image).

dtc_sod.title: Security Object Document
dtc_sod.description: The encoded Security Object Document (SOD) for DTC, which contains the digital signature and other cryptographic information.
